<<<<<<< HEAD
The grand inquiry who is the righteous man: or, The character of a true beleever in his approaches towards heaven. Whereunto is added The resolution of a case of separation betwixt man and wife, propounded to the author by a party much concerned. By William Moore rector at Whalley in Lancashire. Moore, William, rector of Whalley, Lancashire.
[8], 172, [2] p.
printed by E. Cotes, for Henry Eversden, at the Gray-hound in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1658.
"The resolution of a case of separation" has caption title; register and pagination are continuous. With a final advertisement leaf. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Librabry.
=======
